page.title: 01THE TOTAL AREA
page.content: A MAJORITY OF OUR AREA IS COVERED BY FARM LAND.IN RIDGE MOST OF THE LAND IS AGRICULTURE LAND.IF YOU WANT TO PLAY ANY SPORTS BUT GOLF YOU HAVE TO LEAVE THE AREA.THE MAIN FEATURE IN OUR AREA IS THE BALFOUR BEATTY M 25 MOTORWAY CONSTRUCTION SITE.AT THE CONSTRUCTION SITE THEY ARE BUILDING A BRIDGE IN PLACE OF AN OLD BRIDGE.AT BIGNAL'S CORNER THERE IS A VERY LARGE ROUNDABOUT.BALFOUR BEATTY ALSO HAVE A SITE THERE WHERE THEY ARE BUILDING A ROAD THROUGH BIGNAL'S.BRIDGEFOOT IS A STREAM WHICH IS ABOUT TWO FOOT DEEP. AT RIDGE THERE IS FARM A FARM CALLED RIDGE FARM.IT IS A STUD FARM AND THE OWNER HAS ONE OF THE BIGGEST LOTUS COLLECTIONS IN BRITAIN.JUST DOWN THE ROAD THERE IS ANOTHER STUD FARM CALLED CHURCH FARM.THERE ARE SOME SEWAGE WORKS.GOING RIGHT THROUGH OUR AREA THERE'S A ROAD.
